provider.description: Which AI provider to use. 'template' uses deterministic template-based summaries (no external API).

model.description: Model identifier for the chosen provider.

apiKey.description: API key for the chosen provider. Can also be set via OPENAI_API_KEY or ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variables.

baseUrl.description: Override the base URL for the AI API (useful for proxies or self-hosted models).

timeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for AI API calls.

includeRunbook.description: Include runbook suggestions in the summary.

runbooks.description: Embedded runbook snippets for RAG-style lookup.
